flavor: The strange statuette isn't as easy to hold as it looks. Your fingers appear to bend around the idol, gripping it from impossible positions.
name: Warped Idol
text: Increase the modifier of each [tablet] token revealed at your location by 1. (Example: -3 becomes -2) [reaction] When you would move from a location, exhaust Warped Idol: This movement ignores all attacks of opportunity and effects on scenario cards that would trigger from that movement.

flavor: Wycliffe's silver ring is engraved with a Latin inscription circling the outside: "Virtue Silentio Amore."
name: Wycliffe's Ring
text:
You get +2 maximum hand size.
Encounter cards do not count toward your maximum hand size.
[reaction] When an encounter card is added to the hand of an investiagtor at your location, exhaust Wycliffe's Ring: Draw a card.

flavor: Square your actions by the square of virtue with all mankind.
name: Compass of the Grand Lodge
text:
[reaction] When Compass of the Grand Lodge enters play, choose one: Hand, Arcane, Accessory. You gain 1 additional slot of the chosen type.
[reaction] When you play an asset that fills a slot of the chosen type, exhaust Compass of the Grand Lodge: You get +1 to each of your skills until the end of the round.

flavor: This strange glypth gleaned from the masonic renegades has given you an advantage in keeping the universe in order.
name: Immutable Sigil
text:
[reaction] When a scenario effect would remove any amount of cards from an investigator's hand, play area, or deck from the game: Remove 1 fewer card from the game.
[reaction] If Immutable Sigil would be removed from the game by a scenario effect: Draw it, instead

name: Lingering Fatigue
text: Revelation - Put Lingering Fatigue into play in your threat area. Forced - When one of your cards would be removed from the game by a scenario card effect: Take 1 damage or 1 horror (choose one). [action][action]: Discard Lingering Fatigue
